AI Hints.name: aiwhere
AI Hints.description: restricts the AI to only cast ritual in this terrain

AI Hints.name: aialways
AI Hints.description: AI will always (if chance = 100 try to cast this ritual but not make any long time plans for it. chance=999 is special and means the AI will also make plans for the ritual.)

AI Hints.name: airare
AI Hints.description: Reduces the chance of the AI trying to use this ritual. Chance is the chance of casting the ritual and can be from 1-99. -1 is a special value meaning never cast it.

AI Hints.name: aiweakonly
AI Hints.description: AI commander will only cast this ritual if his troop strength is below this value. One spearman gives 10 troop strength points.

AI Hints.name: aionlyplane
AI Hints.description: AI will only cast ritual when on this plane

AI Hints.name: aitarg
AI Hints.description: For long range rituals. 1=try to target squares with enemy commanders 2=try to target valuable squares with corpses in

AI Hints.name: ainothere
AI Hints.description: AI will not cast ritual in this terrain

AI Hints.name: ainotclose1
AI Hints.description: AI will not cast ritual if close to this terrain radius=1

AI Hints.name: ainotclose2
AI Hints.description: AI will not cast ritual if close to this terrain radius=2

AI Hints.name: ainotclose3
AI Hints.description: AI will not cast ritual if close to this terrain radius=3

AI Hints.name: ainotnearhome
AI Hints.description: AI should not cast this ritual close to home (mindist = nbr of squares away)

AI Hints.name: aiapprspam
AI Hints.description: AI will dedicate apprentices to stay at home and only spam this ritual. Chance is 0-100

AI Hints.name: ainosimul
AI Hints.description: No more than one commander may plan to cast this ritual at once

AI Hints.name: airestrig
AI Hints.description: AI will always try to cast this ritual if it has at least this many of the primary resource for the ritual

AI Hints.name: aimaxcast
AI Hints.description: An AI player will never cast this ritual more than this number of times in a game

Affect Unit.name: teleportloc
Affect Unit.description: Teleport target unit to target location. Attribute value 2 means the caster’s entire army is teleported to the target location.

Affect Unit.name: selectfx
Affect Unit.description: Sets mod-fx-nbr to this value. Used by next command.

Affect Unit.name: setfx
Affect Unit.description: Gives target unit a fx of type mod-fx-nbr and sets it to this value.

Affect Unit.name: fillmirror
Affect Unit.description: Puts a number of images into a mirror -1 = fill to default value (mirrorammo)

Affect Unit.name: updatehome
Affect Unit.description: Updates home for target unit to where he stands. This is used to make some immortals resurrect in the correct place.

Affect Unit.name: bentarg
Affect Unit.description: Gives a beneficial bitmask to the target unit. Particularly useful values for rituals are 2^26 to get the twiceborn effect and 2^22 to get a permanent invulnerability.

Affect Unit.name: bentargall
Affect Unit.description: Like bentarg but also affects all the target’s followers.

Affect Unit.name: setvar
Affect Unit.description: Set the generic modding variable to this value.

Affect Unit.name: bentargvar
Affect Unit.description: Like bentarg but terrain is restricted to the number in the generic modding variable.

Basic.name: ritpow
Basic.description: Sets the ritpow used. If command is not used the latest created newritpow will be used. Existing ritpow numbers can be found in the Ritual Schools table.

Basic.name: level
Basic.description: The level of the ritual. Usually the level is between 1 (apprentice level) and 3 (master level).

Basic.name: cost
Basic.description: Adds a resource cost to the ritual. E.g. cost 4 10 to add a cost of 10 sacrifices. A single ritual can have at most 4 different costs. See table Resource Types for resource types.

Basic.name: terr
Basic.description: Restrict ritual to this terrain only. Negative numbers can be used for special terrain combinations.

Boosts.name: apcost
Boosts.description: Extra Action Points cost for the rituals.

Boosts.name: rebatefx25
Boosts.description: Units with this fx nbr get 25% rebate

Boosts.name: rebatefx50
Boosts.description: Units with this fx nbr get 50% rebate

Boosts.name: rebateterr20
Boosts.description: Ritual cost is 20% cheaper in this terrain

Boosts.name: rebateterr50
Boosts.description: Ritual cost is 20% cheaper in this terrain

Boosts.name: terrboost
Boosts.description: Adds 1 to number of summoned monsters when done in this terrain

Boosts.name: terrscale50
Boosts.description: +50% number of summoned monster when done in this terrain

Boosts.name: sacrscale
Boosts.description: Summoning amount scales with sacrifice production of target square

Casting Restrictions.name: levelreq
Casting Restrictions.description: Caster must be exactly this level to use this ritual and cannot have another power at higher level.

Casting Restrictions.name: resrestrict
Casting Restrictions.description: Caster cannot have this resistance bitmask. Useful values are 2^4 for undead 2^20 for immortal and 2^26 for ethereal.

Casting Restrictions.name: resreq
Casting Restrictions.description: Caster must have this resistance bitmask.

Casting Restrictions.name: benrestrict
Casting Restrictions.description: Caster cannot have this beneficial bitmask

Casting Restrictions.name: fxreq
Casting Restrictions.description: Unit must have 1+ in this fx to learn and cast this ritual. This command is probably not useful for modding.

Casting Restrictions.name: nomonworldreq
Casting Restrictions.description: Monsters in addstring '(-)…​' must not be in the world

Casting Restrictions.name: nomonplayerreq
Casting Restrictions.description: Monsters in addstring '(-)…​' must not be in the world and owned by the current player

Casting Restrictions.name: nomonmasteryreq
Casting Restrictions.description: Monsters in addstring '(-)…​' must not be in the world and owned by the current player unless level is higher than ritual requires

Casting Restrictions.name: nomonelysiumreq
Casting Restrictions.description: Monsters in addstring '(-)…​' must not be in elysium/sky/agartha. Monster in addstring '(+)…​' will disable following minuses if monster fulfils same requirement. This applies for all nomon… commands.

Casting Restrictions.name: nomonreq
Casting Restrictions.description: Monsters in addstring '(-)…​' must not be at target location.

Casting Restrictions.name: nomonhomereq
Casting Restrictions.description: Monsters in addstring '(-)…​' must not have their home at target location.

Casting Restrictions.name: fewmonreq
Casting Restrictions.description: The monsters in addstring '(-)…​' must not be more than max.

Casting Restrictions.name: minmonreq
Casting Restrictions.description: The monsters in addstring '(-)…​' must be at least 'min' in number.

Casting Restrictions.name: monworldreq
Casting Restrictions.description: At least min number (default 1) of the monsters in addstring '(&)…​' must be in the world. The min attribute is optional and can be omitted.

Casting Restrictions.name: monplayerreq
Casting Restrictions.description: At least min number (default 1) of the monsters in addstring '(&)…​' must be in the world and owned by the current player. The min attribute is optional and can be omitted.

Casting Restrictions.name: enchherereq
Casting Restrictions.description: This type of Enchantment must be active where there ritual is cast.

Casting Restrictions.name: nonearby1req
Casting Restrictions.description: this terrain cannot be within 1 square when casting the ritual (a 3x3 square area).

Casting Restrictions.name: nonearby3req
Casting Restrictions.description: this terrain cannot be within 3 squares when casting the ritual (a 7x7 square area).

Casting Restrictions.name: nonearby5req
Casting Restrictions.description: this terrain cannot be within 5 squares when casting the ritual (a 11x11 square area).

Casting Restrictions.name: nonearby7req
Casting Restrictions.description: this terrain cannot be within 7 squares when casting the ritual (a 15x15 square area).

Casting Restrictions.name: nonearby99req
Casting Restrictions.description: this terrain cannot be anywhere on the same plane when casting the ritual

Casting Restrictions.name: nearby1req
Casting Restrictions.description: this terrain must be within 1 square when casting the ritual (a 3x3 square area).

Casting Restrictions.name: nearby3req
Casting Restrictions.description: this terrain must be within 3 squares when casting the ritual (a 7x7 square area).

Casting Restrictions.name: nearby5req
Casting Restrictions.description: this terrain must be within 5 squares when casting the ritual (a 11x11 square area).

Casting Restrictions.name: nearby7req
Casting Restrictions.description: this terrain must be within 7 squares when casting the ritual (a 15x15 square area).

Casting Restrictions.name: nearby99req
Casting Restrictions.description: this terrain must be somewhere on the same plane when casting the ritual

Casting Restrictions.name: noportalreq
Casting Restrictions.description: location where ritual is cast mustn’t contain a portal

Casting Restrictions.name: maxcast
Casting Restrictions.description: ritual cannot be cast more than this number of times per player

Casting Restrictions.name: planereq
Casting Restrictions.description: Can only be cast on this plane. See table Plane Numbers.

Casting Restrictions.name: nofxherereq
Casting Restrictions.description: to be written

Casting Restrictions.name: nofortreq
Casting Restrictions.description: to be written

Casting Restrictions.name: fortreq
Casting Restrictions.description: to be written

Casting Restrictions.name: hasportalreq
Casting Restrictions.description: to be written

Copy/Clear.name: copyritual
Copy/Clear.description: Copies all stats and abilities (except pow nbr and name) from another ritual to the current one.

Copy/Clear.name: clearritspec
Copy/Clear.description: Removes all special attributes from a ritual. This is only useful when modifying existing rituals.

Difficulty.name: free
Difficulty.description: always start with this ritual in addition the others

Difficulty.name: start
Difficulty.description: will start with this ritual(s) no others

Difficulty.name: nostart
Difficulty.description: never start with this ritual (or learn from mastery)

Difficulty.name: rarestart
Difficulty.description: reduced chance of starting with this ritual

Difficulty.name: notforpoor
Difficulty.description: units with more expensive rituals can’t get this one

Difficulty.name: nexttoo
Difficulty.description: recives next ritual too when receiving this one

Difficulty.name: afterprev
Difficulty.description: must know previous ritual before learning this one

Difficulty.name: gathergems
Difficulty.description: will start gathering gems when knowing this ritual

Event Interaction.name: addvar
Event Interaction.description: increases the value of this event variable by 1

Event Interaction.name: subvar
Event Interaction.description: decreases the value of this event variable by 1

Mastery.name: newrit
Mastery.description: Grants a new ritual of this level.

Mastery.name: gainrit
Mastery.description: Learns the ritual that is offset numbers away. E.g. offset 1 = learn the following ritual when casting this one.

Mastery.name: rebatelvl
Mastery.description: This ritual will be half price if caster is this level or higher.

Mastery.name: levelup
Mastery.description: Will level up if caster is below this level. Leveling up means becoming a new monster determined by the mastery monster command.

Mastery.name: levelupmon
Mastery.description: Like levelup but the new monster type is set by the addstring command. Set the new monster type in the addstring command.

Special.name: gainbless
Special.description: Percent chance of gaining a bless effect.

Special.name: gaindarkbless
Special.description: Percent chance of gaining a dark bless effect.

Special.name: ornext
Special.description: This ritual will have one of two possible effects. The first effect will consist of the following command the next effect will consist of the remaining commands. Percent is the chance of the first effect happening.

Special.name: ornext2
Special.description: This ritual will have one of two possible effects. The first effect will consist of the two following commands the next effect will consist of the remaining commands. Percent is the chance of the first effect happening.

Special.name: ornext3
Special.description: This ritual will have one of two possible effects. The first effect will consist of the three following commands the next effect will consist of the remaining commands. Percent is the chance of the first effect happening.

Special.name: closewin
Special.description: Closes the ritual window after the ritual has completed.

Special.name: unfollowtarg
Special.description: Removes all followers from the target should he be a commander that is commanding any units.

Special.name: enchreqterr
Special.description: Enchantment will be auto dispelled if it is outside this terrain.

Special.name: forgetcurrit
Special.description: Caster will forget this ritual after casting it.

Start.name: newritpow
Start.description: Creates an entire new school of rituals called a ritpow. This should be the first command when creating a new batch of rituals.

Start.name: newritual
Start.description: Create a new ritual with this name. This should be the first command for each new ritual.

Start.name: selectritual
Start.description: The optional value offs can be used to select a ritual other than the first one with this name. 0=the first one 1=the second ritual with this name.

Summoning.name: addstring
Summoning.description: Adds some text data to a ritual. Most often used to set what is summoned by a summoning ritual but it depends on what effects are in the ritual.

Summoning.name: summoning
Summoning.description: The ritual will summon the monsters specified in a random 'string'. Use addstring to add up to 15 strings with monsters. The string should be written like these examples:'1d6*Goblin' 'c*Captain & 2d6*spearman & 2d4+2*Archer' 'Purple Worm'. The c* indicates a commander and 2d6 means two 6-sided dice will determine the number of monsters summoned. Dice cannot be combined with commanders.

Summoning.name: farsummon
Summoning.description: Like summoning but it will occur at target location instead of at the caster’s location.

Summoning.name: sum0chance
Summoning.description: Use with summonings. Percent = chance of first 'string' to be used instead of a random string among the others.

Summoning.name: sum1chance
Summoning.description: Use with summonings. Percent = chance of second 'string' to be used instead of a random string among the third and later.

Summoning.name: sum0snow
Summoning.description: Works like sum0chance but it can only succeed if there is snow at the target location.

Summoning.name: defctrl
Summoning.description: Default control chance for summonings. Can be overridden by monster’s own ctrlchance.

Summoning.name: raisedead
Summoning.description: Raises humanoid corpses from the dead.

Summoning.name: raiseanimals
Summoning.description: Raises animal corpses from the dead.

Summoning.name: setplayer
Summoning.description: Following summons will be owned by this player. Default owner is the current player. Player -1 resets the owner to the default

Target Location Effects.name: reducetown
Target Location Effects.description: Reduces settlement at target location one step in size.

Target Location Effects.name: destroyterr
Target Location Effects.description: Destroys any valuable terrain at target location.

Target Location Effects.name: alterloc
Target Location Effects.description: Changes target square to this terrain.

Target Location Effects.name: makeportal
Target Location Effects.description: Connect this square to other portals of the same number. Portal nbr 1000 is special and will create a unique number.

Target Location Effects.name: trollifyloc
Target Location Effects.description: Transform forest at target location into a troll forest.

Target Location Effects.name: portalroom
Target Location Effects.description: Creates a portal to a location around this terrain.

Target Location Effects.name: movehome
Target Location Effects.description: Moves home citadel location to target square.

Target Location Effects.name: putcorpses
Target Location Effects.description: Creates a number of human corpses in the target square (as if a fight involving humans had taken place there).

Targetting.name: chooseterrloc
Targetting.description: Player will choose target location for ritual.

Targetting.name: randterrloc
Targetting.description: Sets loc to a random terrain of this type on active plane.

Targetting.name: randomloc
Targetting.description: 1=random land loc 2=many dead (excluding present) 3=rand enemy com 4=rand enemy citadel 5=home citadel

Targetting.name: randnewloc
Targetting.description: Like previous but try to find an unknown location first.

Targetting.name: newlocplanes
Targetting.description: Like randnewloc but will go to other planes if necessary (but not hades)

Targetting.name: chooseloc
Targetting.description: Player choose target location. 2=deviate to many dead 3=empty mirror req 4=empty gold mirror 5=horror mark deviation

Targetting.name: planeloc
Targetting.description: Shift target loc to same position but on another plane (neg = toggle between this plane and elysium).

Targetting.name: setplane
Targetting.description: Following randomloc etc. commands will be restricted to this plane

Targetting.name: choosefxtarg
Targetting.description: Player will choose a target unit that has this fx nbr.

Targetting.name: mirrortarg
Targetting.description: Set targ to an empty mirror unit attr = size for mirror -1=any size

Targetting.name: montarg
Targetting.description: Sets targ unit to a random unit at target location among the type added by addstring.

Transformation.name: promotion
Transformation.description: Promote existing units to another monster type. Use addstring to add promotion pairs the first string sets a source unit and the second one the destination units. Multiple of these pairs can be added to a single ritual.

Transformation.name: transformtarg
Transformation.description: Will transform target into the unit type set by addstring. Value 1 = standard (use this) 2 = transform into following unit if level is high enough.
